title.rendered: INTECH awarded project for modernizing motor control centers at one of the largest downstream facilities in Africa

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH has agreed terms for modernizing motor control centers at one of the largest downstream facilities in Africa.

INTECH’s client on this project, a major IOC in Africa, sought INTECH’s services for upgrading the MCCs at its facility. INTECH’s successful project history with the client, excellent business relationship, and its familiarity with the said facility were instrumental in winning this project.

INTECH’s cutting-edge solution will enhance system performance, safety, and productivity combined with the requisite robustness and durability for operating in the most demanding operating scenarios. A highly qualified team of experts and their proven ability to provide on-site support complemented by INTECH’s strategic OEM partnerships will deliver a field-proven integrated control & power package, ensuring a smooth transition and fast startup.

About INTECH’s Electrical Systems

INTECH’s Electrical Systems cover power supply, distribution, motor control, solar, and related electrical systems in skids and containerized buildings for easy deployment to project sites. INTECH builds fully furnished modular building solutions for electrical, automation, and hybrid applications and delivers packaged buildings and E-houses as a turnkey solution for easy deployment, quick project turnaround, and accelerated progress towards production goals. These solutions include Control and Electrical Buildings, Containerized Control Rooms, Power Skids, LV/MV MCCs and Switchgears.

For more information, please visit: https://www.intechww.com/electrical-solutions/

About INTECH

INTECH Automation & Intelligence is a globally renowned industrial automation & digitalization technology company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies resolve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation. INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As part of our promise of helping businesses evolve in the Industry 4.0 era, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
